column5: My place is only a 5 minute walk from the light rail, making downtown easily accessible without the hassle of fighting through traffic or worrying about parking.  You'll get the first floor bedroom, bathroom, and outdoor back patio all to yourself. You're able to enter through the front door or through a private entrance directly into the room from the patio.  The room comes equipped with a TV (antenna, Chromecast, and HDMI cable) and coffee maker.
column8: East Midtown Private 1st Floor: room, bath & patio
